SERIESLOOKUP_DESCRIPTION: Shows a series different characters, combo cards, and banners
NO__LAST_CHAR_FOUND: {{author}} You do not have any cards in your collection yet
NO_CHAR_NOT_OWNED: {{author}} This series does not have any characters that you are missing
NO_CHAR_FOUND: {{author}} This series does not have any characters yet
NO_SERIES_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any series with the name `{{name}}`
ERROR: {{author}} An error occurred. Please try again
COMBO_EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
A combo card containing {{count}} characters
Use the arrows to navigate between combo cards.
NO_CHARACTER_DISPLAY: No character information available to display.
NO_COMBO_FOUND: No combo cards found for characters in this series.
COMBO_SERIES_DATA:
Found {{count}} combo cards for {{series}}
Type the number below to view its details.
BANNER_MAXIMUM_CREATIONS: This banner has reached the limit for the number of banners that can be created.
MAXIMUM_PROJECTS: You have reached the maximum amount of projects. Delete/Finish a project to create a new one
ALREADY_PROJECT_SERIES: You already have a banner project for this series. Please delete it before creating a new one.
INVALID_SERIALS: {{author}} Invalid serial numbers provided. Please ensure they are comma-separated and within the valid range.
WISHLIST_SLOTS_EXCEEDED: {{author}} Adding these characters would exceed your wishlist capacity. You need to remove {{excess}} character(s) or you can increase your capacity using the `{{prefix}}wl` command.
ALL_CHARS_ALREADY_IN_WL: {{author}} All specified characters are already in your wishlist.
MAX_SERIALS: {{author}} You can only add up to 10 characters at a time to your wishlist.

SERIESLOOKUP_EXTRA_INFO: Shows a series different characters, combo cards, and banners. If used without a series name, it will instead look up your most recently obtained card series. Additionally characters can be added to your wishlist based on their serial number on the series character list
